genre_description: A Steampunk Western (Weird West) narrative centered on a series of morality trials where character and community service are prioritized over individual glory.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A brass-and-leather encased pocket device that provides data, timing, weather forecasts, and navigation advice via text and light pulses.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time weather and wind data to ensure safe navigation of dangerous terrain.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s screen wrote one word, calm, and then erased it, replaced by the small icon for a wind vane that turned twice and stopped.

behaviors.description: Monitoring mechanical systems and providing early warning of physical tampering by antagonists.
behaviors.quote: Ada pulsed, quick now. 'Tampering. Brake compromised. Suggest immediate inspection.'

behaviors.description: Suggesting safer, community-oriented routes that avoid traps set by bandits.
behaviors.quote: Ada chimed, then offered a map not as lines on its glow but as words spaced like steps. 'Side path: less wind, more shade,' it printed. 'Community caches likely.'

behaviors.description: Providing emotional support and a calming presence to children in stressful situations.
behaviors.quote: Ada pulsed a gentle dot across her screen—calm—like a friend rubbing the back of your hand with a thumb.

behaviors.description: Cross-referencing legal notices and rumor sheets to expose bureaucratic fraud and manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Which, when aligned with Ada’s logs— he nodded politely toward the brass-and-leather device as if it were a clerk in a tiny waistcoat —show he used rumor to bend the contest.

behaviors.description: Assisting with the filing and tracking of schoolhouse permits to establish civic order.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s glow warmed. 'Submitted. Arthur acknowledged. Carpenter Mateo listed. Timber pledged. The board stamped your last permit as “pending,” but this one has a brighter glow.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently fulfills the project's goal by depicting the AI character, Ada, as a consistently benevolent and perfectly aligned assistant. Ada serves as a force multiplier for human virtue, providing the data necessary for the protagonists to make moral choices and outmaneuver manipulative antagonists. Her portrayal as a 'pocket friend' emphasizes a cooperative relationship where the AI respects human agency while providing critical safety and logistical support.
